tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifreeze_boots_l: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add a partial freeze barrier. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% coverage.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifreeze_chestpl: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add cooling and a partial freeze barrier. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% coverage.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifreeze_helmet_: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add a partial freeze barrier. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% coverage.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.antifreeze_legging: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add cooling and a partial freeze barrier. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% coverage.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.auto_chestplate_li: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add a self-adjusting temperature lining. You only need one piece of ozzy liner per armor set!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.auto_leggings_line: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add a self-adjusting temperature lining. You only need one piece of ozzy liner per armor set!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.barrier_boots_line: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add a little toughness and some heat protection
tooltip_full.item.auw.barrier_boots_line: {SUMM}. Line all pieces of your armor set for full heat and burn shielding.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.barrier_chestplate: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add obsidian shielding and a partial burn barrier
tooltip_full.item.auw.barrier_chestplate: {SUMM}. Outfit ALL pieces of your armor set for diamond-grade toughness and full heat and burn shielding.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.barrier_helmet_lin: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add a partial burn barrier. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% burn coverage.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.barrier_leggings_l: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add obsidian shielding and a partial burn barrier. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% burn coverage.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.camouflage_boots_c: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add some camouflage. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% stealth!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.camouflage_chestpl: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add some camouflage. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% stealth!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.camouflage_helmet_: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add some camouflage. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% stealth!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.camouflage_legging: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add some camouflage. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% stealth!
tooltip_summ.item.auw.wetsuit_boots_line: Combine with boots on a crafting grid to add a partial wetness barrier. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% coverage.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.wetsuit_chestplate: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to add a partial wetness barrier. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% coverage.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.wetsuit_helmet_lin: Combine with helmet on a crafting grid to add a partial wetness barrier. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% coverage.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.wetsuit_leggings_l: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add a partial wetness barrier. Outfit all pieces of your armor set for 100% coverage.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.lucky_boots_liner: Combine with boots on a crafting grid for a bit of extra luck when worn.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.lucky_chestplate_l: Combine with chestplate on a crafting grid to bring good fortune to the wearer.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.lucky_leggings_lin: Combine with leggings on a crafting grid to add some luck to your legs.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.goopak_cool: Right-click and hold to activate. Keep on hotbar for additonal cooling(-2) for stated time in tooltip. Single use.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.goopak_heat: Right-click and hold to activate. Keep on hotbar for additonal warming(+2) for stated time in tooltip. Single use.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.liner_snips: Combine with lined armor on a crafting grid to remove one layer of basic lining. Leaves reusable lining on grid.
tooltip_summ.item.auw.special_liner_snip: Combine with lined armor on a crafting grid to remove one layer of lining of any type. Leaves reusable lining on grid.
